title: 关于命令方块的问题QAQ
author: 莉莉酱
txt_content: /summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~{Equipment:[{id:137,Count:6},{id:24,Count:5},{id:5,Damage:4,Count:8},{id:20,Count:5},{id:133,Count:20}],为什么用命令方块生成实体怪物 但是怪物缺刷不出来啊

replies.author: mcfans2001
replies.txt_content:
莉莉酱 发表于 2014-9-6 09:54
当然是1.7.x啦= =
如果不想打命令可以用NBT将怪物编辑好
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-78479-1-1.html
在用MCEDIT转换为命令方块
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-212493-1-1.html

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content: 后面少打了半个大括号"}"

replies.author: Koke_Cacao
replies.txt_content:
这样才是对的
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~
{Equipment:[{id:137,Count:6},{id:24,Count:5},{id:5,Damage:4,Count:8},{id:20,Count:5},{id:133,Count:20}]}复制代码
不只是少打了大括号 还多打了逗号
